title: Le Pain Quotidien
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring organic artisan bakery and communal table. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes and a few vegan ones plus a vegan muffin. Food service stops 1 hour before closing. Many locations in Belgium.
